name: Grimm Blossoms
description:
Grimm Blossoms

DESCRIPTION:

A Little Red-Cap retelling that unfolds into any of 12 unique endings. Keep to the path written into the original Brothers Grimm tale, or take a trip on a new narrative concoction you brew. Along the way you may discover the name of a wolf, a lost father, and/or a grandma who is as bad-ass as she is bed-ridden. Survival is easy; what else can you do?

CONTENT WARNING: Violence; Graphic Imagery

ADDITIONAL CREDITS: This game was made in collaboration with soymilk_please.
